quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: China Glass Holdings Ltd is a company principally engaged in the production, marketing and distribution of glass and glass products. The Company operates its business through five segments. The Clear Glass Products segment is mainly engaged in the produces, markets and distributes clear glass products. The Energy Saving and New Energy Glass Products segment is mainly engaged in production, processing, marketing, and distribution of energy saving and new energy glass products. The Coated Glass Products segment is mainly engaged in production, marketing and distribution of coated glass products. The Painted Glass Products segment is mainly engaged in production, marketing and distribution of painted glass products. The Design and Installation Related Service segment is mainly engaged in providing design, purchasing parts and installation services of glass production lines, and upgrading and transformation services of glass production process.
